backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, public profiles, events, chat messages, access control, and approval workflows with state management and helper authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping product requirements to frontend file paths, components, and test IDs with confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Plain-text mapping of frontend file paths to short summaries describing their purpose and behavior.
frontend/index.css: TailwindCSS base file defining theme variables, dark mode values, and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the application's TanStack Router setup, route tree, and layout wrapped in AppShell.
frontend/src/components/admin/ChatModera: Admin UI component for reviewing, approving, and removing chat messages with loading states and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/admin/EventsMana: Admin UI to list, create, and delete events using event-related hooks with form dialogs and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProfileVal: Displays public profiles and allows admins to toggle validation status with mutation calls and badges.
frontend/src/components/admin/PublicProf: Editor for selecting a user profile and updating its fields via a create-or-update mutation.
frontend/src/components/admin/Statistics: Fetches and displays aggregate admin statistics in a grid of metric cards.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Sign-in/sign-out button using Internet Identity with loading state and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Wrapper that checks admin status and blocks access with an error card if the caller is not an admin.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Redirects unauthenticated users to home and shows a sign-in card until authentication.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireOnbo: Redirects authenticated users to onboarding if their profile isn't complete and waits for profile load.
Button to vote on chat messages, calling vote mutation and handling duplicate-vote errors.
frontend/src/components/landing/Sponsors: Static sponsors list rendered as cards linking to external sponsor websites.
Main layout component managing header, navigation, auth state, and onboarding gating.
frontend/src/components/system/Initializ: Displays initialization slow/error banners with retry and reload actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Provides hooks to check admin status and fetch admin statistics via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthState.ts: Exposes basic authentication state derived from Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useChat.ts: Hooks for fetching, posting, voting, approving, and removing chat messages with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches the authenticated user's profile from the backend with loading/error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useEvents.ts: Hooks for listing, fetching, creating, updating, deleting, and RSVPing to events via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInitializationWatc: Watches auth, actor, and profile initialization for slow or error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeaderboard.ts: Provides a React Query hook to fetch the leaderboard from the backend actor when available.
frontend/src/hooks/usePublicProfiles.ts: Defines React Query hooks for listing, fetching, creating/updating, and validating public profiles via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains mutation hooks for user registration, onboarding completion, and saving the caller's user profile.
frontend/src/hooks/useSafeActor.ts: Creates a backend actor tied to the current identity with background admin initialization and exposes loading states.
frontend/src/index.css: Imports the project's base CSS file.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Renders the admin dashboard with tabbed panels for stats, profiles, public profiles, events, and chat management.
frontend/src/pages/ChatPage.tsx: Displays the community guestbook with message posting and a feed of approved messages.
frontend/src/pages/CommunityDirectoryPag: Shows a directory of public profiles with validation indicators and links to detailed views.
frontend/src/pages/EventDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed event information and allows authenticated users to RSVP.
frontend/src/pages/EventsListPage.tsx: Displays a list of community events with loading, empty, and populated states, requiring authentication and onboarding.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page showing hero content, feature cards, sponsors, and redirects authenticated users based on onboarding status.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardPage.tsx: Shows the community leaderboard with ranked contributors, load/error handling, and auth/onboarding enforcement.
frontend/src/pages/MyProfilePage.tsx: Allows users to view and edit their profile, see points, and handle loading, errors, and completion status.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingPage.tsx: Guides authenticated users through registration and onboarding steps with profile checks and navigation logic.
frontend/src/pages/PartnersPage.tsx: Renders a list of partner organizations with logos, descriptions, and outbound links.
frontend/src/pages/PublicProfilePage.tsx: Renders a public profile page with authentication and onboarding guards, fetching a profile by principal and displaying company info, biography, services, and links.
frontend/src/utils/linkParsing.ts: Provides utilities to validate URLs, extract valid URLs from text, and generate display-friendly labels from URLs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, supporting both query and hash routing plus sessionStorage persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, animations, typography, and container settings for the frontend.
project_state.json: Describes the projectâ€™s state, app goals, architecture, issues, and existing implemented features for the NG COIN ICP application.
